hero.title: Heal Your Heart, Transform Your Life
hero.subtitle: Specialist in Codependency and Childhood Wounds
hero.description: With over 35 years of experience, I guide you toward deep healing and self-love. Discover how to break toxic patterns and create healthy relationships.

items.title: Healing the Maternal Wound
items.description: A profound guide to heal the deepest wounds of our childhood and find inner peace.

items.title: Love or Codependency
items.description: Discover the difference between true love and codependent patterns that damage our relationships.

therapy.title: Individual Therapy
therapy.description: Personalized sessions to work on your specific wounds and codependency patterns.

workshops.title: Group Workshops
workshops.description: Experience healing in community with others who share your journey.

items.name: María González
items.text: Aura helped me understand patterns I had been repeating for years. Her approach is deep and healing.

items.name: Carmen Rodríguez
items.text: After working with Aura, I was finally able to establish healthy boundaries in my relationships.

items.name: Ana López
items.text: Her books and therapy gave me the tools I needed to heal my inner child.

footer.description: Psychotherapist specialized in codependency and childhood wounds.
